query.sql: SELECT e.employee_code, e.employee_id, e.employee_name, p.project_name, p.project_id, p.price, SUM(p.price) total_price, COUNT(1) total_date FROM gc_employee e, gc_work_record r, gc_project p WHERE e.employee_id = r.employee_id AND p.project_id = r.project_id and p.project_id = ${@project_id} AND IFNULL(r.settlement_flag,'N') != 'Y' #AND_CLAUSE# GROUP BY e.employee_code, e.employee_name, p.project_name, p.price

query.name: detail
query.sql: SELECT e.employee_code, e.employee_id, e.employee_name, p.project_name, r.work_date, p.price FROM gc_employee e, gc_work_record r, gc_project p WHERE e.employee_id = r.employee_id AND p.project_id = r.project_id and p.project_id = ${@project_id} AND IFNULL(r.settlement_flag,'N') != 'Y' and e.employee_id = ${@employee_id}
